channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The spectacle of Bryan Johnson and his livestreamed shrooms trip
item.description: Bryan Johnson livestreamed his shrooms trip -- which included both Grimes and Marc Benioff -- as part of his controversial longevity research.

item.title: New HBO Max 4K Stream of Mad Men Included Visible Crew Members on the Puke Pump
item.description: Very on brand for HBO Max.

item.title: RFK Jr. Taps Preacher Who Blames Vaccines for Cancer, Compares Covid Tracking to Nazi Germany
item.description: Kirk Milhoan has claimed without evidence that the covid-19 shots caused spikes in cancer and miscarriages. Now he's helping shape the country's vaccine policy.

item.title: Your Data Might Determine How Much You Pay for Eggs
item.description: A newly enacted New York law requires retailers to say whether your data influences the price of basic goods like a dozen eggs or toilet paper, but not how.

item.title: Microsoft and Google AI veteran to replace outgoing Apple exec John Giannandrea
item.description: Apple’s ML and AI Strategy SVP is leaving next year, but ex-Microsoft AI VP Amar Subramanya is joining.

item.title: Android’s new ‘Call Reason’ flags important calls before you even pick up
item.description: Android users will soon have an option to add an “urgent” indicator to their calls, which shows up on the receiver’s incoming call screen and in their call history if they don’t pick up. It’s a new feature in beta testing in the Phone by Google app, Call Reason, that will only work for people […]

item.title: The Movie Industry Kept Trying to Make Popcorn Buckets Happen Again This Year
item.description: The viral 'Dune: Part Two' sandworm emerged in early 2024, and its impact is still being felt whether we like it or not.

item.title: Google is getting ready to launch AI-powered notification summaries on more Android devices
item.description: More Android phones will soon support AI-powered notification summaries. The feature, which is bundled in the latest version of Android 16, is only available to Pixel devices for now, but its inclusion in the update suggests that it will arrive on third-party phones next. Google first launched notification summaries for Pixel phones last month. Unlike […]...

item.title: Android 16’s latest update ushers in a more frequent release schedule
item.description: The latest update for Android 16 has arrived, marking the official end to Google’s annual release schedule. Compared to the major Android 16 launch in June, the new 16 QPR2 release is a minor update that expands features for notifications, icons, calling screens, and more, and signals the start of Google’s long-awaited plans to release […]

item.title: Android 16 adds AI notification summaries, new customization options, and more
item.description: The rollout of the new Android 16 features, which are first coming to Pixel devices, marks a new chapter in how Android updates work, as the company is shifting from a single yearly update to more frequent releases.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold's folding mechanism looks odd, but it's the right call on a crucial design decision
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold is finally official, and while Samsung’s first multi-fold device might look a bit peculiar, I think it’s taken the right approach with an important design feature

item.title: The next Android 16 update has landed – here are the 7 biggest features
item.description: A new version of Android 16 has landed with all sorts of new features and improvements.

item.title: Luigi Mangione hearing: Officer recalls arrest at McDonald’s
item.description: The officer at one point started whistling over the restaurant’s holiday-season music to ‘make him think that nothing was different about this call than any other call.’ A Pennsylvania police officer responding to a tip from the manager of a McDonald’s testified Tuesday about confronting Luigi Mangione during the intense manhunt last year for UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson’s killer....

item.title: Amazon lance sa nouvelle puce IA sur fond de concurrence accrue
item.description: La filiale d’Amazon dédiée à l’informatique à distance (cloud), Amazon Web Services (AWS), a dévoilé mardi sa nouvelle puce dédiée au développement et au fonctionnement de l’intelligence artificielle (IA), un processeur présenté comme économique alors que la concurrence s’accélère sur ce marché.

item.title: The Kobo remote is finally here — buy it alongside the discounted Kobo Libra Colour
item.description: Buy a Kobo remote for your e-reading experience

item.title: Anthropic launches Claude for Nonprofits for Giving Tuesday
item.description: Anthropic, in partnership with global charity holiday Giving Tuesday, launches Claude for Nonprofits and free resources to scale AI adoption.

item.title: These terrific Cyber Monday deals are still available for $100 or less
item.description: With Cyber Monday officially in the rearview mirror, it’s easy to assume that you missed the last big shopping event of the year. While that might technically be the case, there are still plenty of leftover deals to choose from, some of which can still be had for well under $100. That makes now a […]

item.title: In a new college admissions era, AI may be scoring your college essay
item.description: This fall, Virginia Tech is debuting an AI-powered essay reader—and other colleges are interested in it. Students applying to college know they can’t—or at least shouldn’t—use AI chatbots to write their essays and personal statements. So it might come as a surprise that some schools are now using artificial intelligence to read them.

item.title: Everything to know about the Home Depot Cyber Monday 2025: Best deals, Ending time, and more
item.description: The Home Depot's Cyber Monday sale is still live. Whether you're shopping in stores or online, here are all the details to know.

item.title: Russian speaking hacking group now shifting focus to government targets
item.description: The focus is now on stealth, long-term persistence, and cyber-espionage against government and similar organizations.

item.title: Anthropic Accidentally Gives the World a Peek Into Its Model’s ‘Soul’
item.description: Does a chatbot have a soul? Sort of.

item.title: All the states Pornhub is blocked in now
item.description: Due to age-verification laws, Pornhub has blocked itself in 22 U.S. states as of December 2025.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’s Blue Origin Wants to Dump Millions of Gallons of Waste Into a Protected Lagoon
item.description: Space Coast communities have spent years and millions of dollars restoring the Indian River Lagoon. Now, they hope to stop Blue Origin from reversing that progress.

item.title: Forget Prime – Amazon starts 30-minute deliveries to show good things come to those with zero patience
item.description: Amazon is test-driving 30-minute deliveries in two US states, and we wonder if this is the beginning of the end of our patience.

item.title: Huge cryptomixer takedown sees feds seize over $30milion
item.description: Another mixing service bites the dust, but no arrests were made.

item.title: The best Cyber Monday deals still live at Home Depot: Score free cordless tools from DeWalt, holiday decorations, and more
item.description: Shop Home Depot's Black Friday sale on tools, appliances, holiday decor, and more from top brands like DeWalt and Ryobi.

item.title: Lego’s Wild New ‘Stranger Things’ Set Takes You Inside Vecna’s Mind
item.description: The Creel House will release on January 1, 2026, just in time for the conclusion of 'Stranger Things' season five.

item.title: Netflix launches a mobile-friendly version of Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Players with a Netflix subscription can now download the game, which features mobile-friendly controls, including touch-screen shooting and navigation. It's important to note that the game does not feature a multiplayer mode and players must be connected to the internet to play; offline gameplay is not available.

item.title: The new flex: Fatherhood
item.description: What this CEO learned about leadership through family. Fatherhood used to be invisible in the conversation about entrepreneurship. The story was always the same: A founder celebrated for sacrifice, for grinding through the night, taming fortune one day at a time. The world championed the grind. But that archetype is now deeply outdated.

item.title: The iPad Pro with M5 chip is still live post-Cyber Monday, saving $100 on the latest iPad
item.description: As of Dec. 2, the iPad Pro with M5 chip is still on sale post-Black Friday and Cyber Monday. Get it for just $899 and save $100 on Apple's latest iPad.

item.title: Shark is gifting up to 50% off appliances in their Cyber Week sale – save big on vacuums, beauty, and more
item.description: Shark's Cyber Week sale offers up to 50% off a wide range of appliances, including vacuums, hair tools, and more.

item.title: Cyber Monday Apple steal still available: The 2025 M5 MacBook Pro is $8 cheaper than the slower M4 Pro
item.description: Did you mean to buy the MacBook Pro on Black Friday? The 2025 M5 Pro is still at record-low pricing at Amazon — save $250.

item.title: ChatGPT referrals to retailers’ apps increased 28% year-over-year, says report
item.description: ChatGPT referrals to retailers' apps were up on Black Friday year-over-year, with Walmart and Amazon benefiting the most.

item.title: AWS launches new Nova AI models and a service that gives customers more control
item.description: Amazon Web Services announced four new AI models within its Nova model family and a frontier model service.

item.title: The Bose New QuietComfort Ultra headphones are still $50 after Cyber Monday
item.description: As of Dec. 2, get the Bose New QuietComfort Ultra headphones for $50 off.

item.title: Australia's social media ban comes into force next week
item.description: Australia's social media ban will come into effect on Wednesday, November 10. Privacy and security experts remain skeptical about its impact, while others praise its role protecting kids online.

item.title: Get ready for 'True RGB' TVs – Sony's OLED-busting next-gen TVs seem to have a name, and they won't be alone
item.description: Sony's new trademark paves the way for its RGB LED TVs

item.title: Galaxy Z TriFold: Specs, features, price
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold so far.

item.title: Score a single Apple AirTag for its Cyber Monday sale price
item.description: As of Dec. 2, get a single Apple AirTag for just $17.97 at Amazon.

item.title: Experts "deeply concerned" by India's plan to force all smartphones to run pre-installed security app
item.description: Authorities said the state-owned Sanchar Saathi app comes as a way to halt cybercrime, but digital rights experts fear for users' privacy and mission creep. Here's all we know.

item.title: « Nous avons tous été surpris » : des volcans de glace ont été observés à la surface de l’objet venu d’ailleurs 3I/Atlas
item.description: La comète interstellaire 3I/Atlas a été observée pour la première fois en juillet dernier. Depuis, il semble que les astronomes lui découvrent une caractéristique inattendue à chaque fois qu’ils pointent un instrument sur elle. Cette fois, des volcans en éruption…

item.title: The new Sony A7 V upgrades impress, but the Sony A7 IV is excellent value in this post-Cyber Monday deal
item.description: The Sony A7 V was announced today, as the A7 IV falls to a record-low price. But which one is the better deal?

item.title: How to watch What is the Monarchy for? on BBC iPlayer (it's *FREE*)
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch What is the Monarchy for? for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: MacBook Pro M5 : le nouveau roi des laptops Apple profite d’une ristourne de 100 € sur Amazon
item.description: Un ultraportable capable de faire tourner la suite Adobe sans chauffer ni lever la voix : c’est exactement ce que promet le nouveau MacBook Pro M5. Et pour une fois, la note ne s'envole pas trop. Amazon le propose déjà sous son prix de lancement de 1 699 euros au lieu de 1 799 euros.
